title: Does anyone find themselves having to report someone almost every ranked game?
body:
I don't report people too frequently as I know my account has a high "dobbing" rate, so I only report when it's serious (rage quit or extreme verbal abuse). I'm finding myself having to report at least one person almost every game and I dont remember it ever being this bad. Gold seems to be tanked with some real gems at the moment. 

It sucks to think that my report tickets will not do anything (I've been chat restricted numerous times when I was struggling with some life issues, it didn't change my behaviour at all so I know it wont change theirs permanently)

replies.body: I have to report someone maybe once every 20 games.

I either report all 4 people or report no one. Either ranked games go really REALLY well for me (don't need to report), we lose the game completely and evenly (don't need to report because we all fed probably) or the whole team (except me) have rage about everything (report all)
I've never reported anyone after a game because I'm too lazy.
agreed, maybe 10 reports max in life, just can't be bothered, they never get fixed anyway
How about realize that your report does absolutely nothing and stop wasting your energy and time reporting them loool
